Name: Gordon Adventure
About the game: GORDON ADVENTURE TAKES 5 MINUTES TO BEAT! THIS IS A VERY SMALL* GAME IT CONTAINS ONLY 3 STAGES. Questions: Why did you make this? - I like the idea of making beginner friendly games. I believe there is room for any kind of game. Why only 3 Stages? -I really like the idea of making it small... I think that by being small, the game is easyer and is more beginner friendly. - I always wanted to make a game that can be completed by any kind of player. I am also learning on how to make platformers. So basically when fitting everything together I came up with this. - The other reason why it has only 3 stages is because I am stil new to the platform genre, so I am unaware if people will enjoy my game or not. FIRST GAME WITH WALKABLE CHARACTER If I feel like people are really enjoying this new genre of game. I may make more games like this. They haven proven to me to be easyer to be made and required less effort then my IDLE games. Maybe mix up a little bit in the future? ABOUT THIS GAME Gordon Adventure is a 2D pixel art platformer, In this game you will be controlling Gordon, And your goal is to dodge the spikes and collect coins. If you manage to beat the game with 100+ score.... You will earn a valuable achievment. FEATURES Controlable character. 2 types of coins to be collected. Dangerous Spikes. 3 Stages to be beaten. Score counter. Enemy rats that can kill you. THANK YOU FOR PLAYING!
